title: Language Learning Design and Research Methods Utilizing Critical Theory

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Webinar-based discussions to apply critical perspectives and develop practical approaches to language learning design and research.

learning_goals: Learners can integrate core concepts of critical theory (e.g., power structures, social context, diversity) into language learning design.
Learners can iteratively improve learning design proposals based on peer feedback through webinar discussions.
Learners can develop evaluation criteria (e.g., cultural bias, learner agency) applying critical theory when analyzing research papers.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
